summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GlixAI platform with all NEW features including Science Streams, Risk Analytics, Shadow Salary IQ, 7-day Micro-Learning Sprints, EQ/SQ Emotional Intelligence Scoring, and Glix Passport. Backend APIs working well (85% success rate), frontend fully functional with all navigation and new feature integrations working.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Takes >30 seconds to respond due to AI processing
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Increase timeout or add loading indicators

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Science term expansion taking too long

design_issues.issue: Some page transitions could be smoother

passed_tests: Landing page loads with updated feature cards including Glix Passport
Navigation to all pages: Chat, Jobs, Resume, Roadmap, Passport
Science Stream filter dropdown (PCM/PCB/PCMB) working perfectly
Job Search returns results with AI Risk Scores and Shadow Salary data
Resume text analysis using JSON body (FormData fix working)
Resume results show EQ/SQ assessment panel with scores
AI Chat sends messages and receives GPT-5.2 responses
Chat history shows in sidebar and persists
Quick prompt navigation to chat working
Backend API endpoints for Science Streams working
Backend API endpoints for Risk Analytics working
Backend API endpoints for Shadow Salary working
Backend API endpoints for Sprint Generator working
Backend API endpoints for EQ/SQ Analysis working
Backend API endpoints for Glix Passport working
Brand configuration and white-label setup working
All data-testid attributes present for automated testing

success_percentage.backend: 85% (17/20 tests passed, 3 timeouts due to AI processing)
success_percentage.frontend: 95%+ (All core functionality working, minor navigation timing issues)
